:POSTROUTING ACCEPT [8:512]

-A POSTROUTING -o xenbr0 -j MASQUERADE
-A POSTROUTING -o tun0 -j MASQUERADE

# Completed on Tue Nov 22 17:58:46 2016
# Generated by iptables-save v1.4.21 on Tue Nov 22 17:58:46 2016
*filter
:INPUT ACCEPT [0:0]
:FORWARD ACCEPT [0:0]
:OUTPUT ACCEPT [40433:16206397]
:RH-Firewall-1-INPUT - [0:0]
-A INPUT -p gre -j ACCEPT
-A INPUT -j RH-Firewall-1-INPUT
-A INPUT -i xapi1 -p udp -m udp --sport 53 -j ACCEPT
-A FORWARD -j RH-Firewall-1-INPUT
-A FORWARD -i xapi1 -j ACCEPT
-A FORWARD -i tun0 -j ACCEPT
-A FORWARD -i xenbr0 -j ACCEPT
-A FORWARD -i eth0 -o eth1 -j ACCEPT
-A OUTPUT -o xenbr0 -p udp -m udp --dport 53 -j ACCEPT
-A OUTPUT -o xenbr0 -p tcp -m tcp --dport 5432 -j ACCEPT
-A OUTPUT -o tun0 -p tcp -m tcp --dport 5432 -j ACCEPT
-A RH-Firewall-1-INPUT -i lo -j ACCEPT
-A RH-Firewall-1-INPUT -p icmp -m icmp --icmp-type any -j ACCEPT
-A RH-Firewall-1-INPUT -i xenapi -p udp -m udp --dport 67 -j ACCEPT
-A RH-Firewall-1-INPUT -m conntrack --ctstate RELATED,ESTABLISHED,INVALID -j ACCEPT
-A RH-Firewall-1-INPUT -p udp -m conntrack --ctstate NEW -m udp --dport 694 -j ACCEPT
-A RH-Firewall-1-INPUT -p udp -m conntrack --ctstate NEW -m udp --dport 53 -j ACCEPT
#-A RH-Firewall-1-INPUT -p udp -m udp --dport 9898 -j ACCEPT
#-A RH-Firewall-1-INPUT -p tcp -m tcp --dport 9898 -j ACCEPT
# k8s master slave - start
-A RH-Firewall-1-INPUT -p udp -m multiport --dports 123,1025,9898,6443,6666,4001,5050,5901,4222,8222,25305,1489,9000,9090 -j ACCEPT
-A RH-Firewall-1-INPUT -p tcp -m multiport --dports 123,1025,9898,6443,6666,4001,5050,5901,4222,8222,25305,1489,9000,9090 -j ACCEPT
-A RH-Firewall-1-INPUT -p udp -m multiport --dports 10250,10251,30098,30006,31105 -j ACCEPT
-A RH-Firewall-1-INPUT -p tcp -m multiport --dports 10250,10251,30098,30006,31105 -j ACCEPT
-A RH-Firewall-1-INPUT -p udp -m multiport --dports 5800:16000 -j ACCEPT
-A RH-Firewall-1-INPUT -p tcp -m multiport --dports 5800:16000 -j ACCEPT
-A RH-Firewall-1-INPUT -p tcp -m multiport --dports 20000:32767 -j ACCEPT
-A RH-Firewall-1-INPUT -p udp -m multiport --dports 20000:32767 -j ACCEPT
# k8s master slave - end
# HAPROXY
-A RH-Firewall-1-INPUT -p udp -m multiport --dports 10000:11100 -j ACCEPT
-A RH-Firewall-1-INPUT -p tcp -m multiport --dports 10000:11100 -j ACCEPT
# HAPROXY
-A RH-Firewall-1-INPUT -p tcp -m conntrack --ctstate NEW -m tcp --dport 22 -j ACCEPT
-A RH-Firewall-1-INPUT -p tcp -m conntrack --ctstate NEW -m tcp --dport 80 -j ACCEPT
-A RH-Firewall-1-INPUT -p tcp -m conntrack --ctstate NEW -m tcp --dport 8080 -j ACCEPT
-A RH-Firewall-1-INPUT -p tcp -m conntrack --ctstate NEW -m tcp --dport 8761 -j ACCEPT
-A RH-Firewall-1-INPUT -p tcp -m conntrack --ctstate NEW -m tcp --dport 443 -j ACCEPT
-A RH-Firewall-1-INPUT -p tcp -m conntrack --ctstate NEW -m tcp --dport 10080 -j ACCEPT
-A RH-Firewall-1-INPUT -p tcp -m conntrack --ctstate NEW -m tcp --dport 5432 -j ACCEPT
-A RH-Firewall-1-INPUT -p tcp -m tcp --dport 21064 -j ACCEPT
-A RH-Firewall-1-INPUT -p tcp -m multiport --dports 3000,5432,8083,8086,8161,8443,8761,9200,9300,10000,10006,10030,61616,10080 -j ACCEPT
-A RH-Firewall-1-INPUT -p udp -m multiport --dports 5404,5405,5432 -j ACCEPT
-A RH-Firewall-1-INPUT -p tcp -m multiport --dports 5000:5002 -j ACCEPT
-A RH-Firewall-1-INPUT -p udp -m multiport --dports 5000:5002 -j ACCEPT
-A RH-Firewall-1-INPUT -j REJECT --reject-with icmp-host-prohibited
COMMIT
# Completed on Tue Nov 22 17:58:46 2016
